column5: Morning all, I trust everyone had a safe weekend   I am looking forward to reading a whole bunch of reports when I come home as I'm sure a few are missing  must have got home late  .  Be careful driving out there today, and watch out for the youngins, and to the parents out there....happy first day of school  Maureen
Yeah I had a really safe weekend. Can't be any safer lying in bed recovering from a back injury.  Man How long does it take? I missing all the action.   dsn
